dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: People think highway accidents are just statistics, but actually, each one is a devastating, real-life tragedy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: People think highway accidents are just statistics, but actually, each one is a devastating, real-life tragedy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and this one on the Almaty-Yekaterinburg highway, just two kilometers from the "Kairak" border post... it's heartbreaking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and this one on the Almaty-Yekaterinburg highway, just two kilometers from the Kairak border post... it's heartbreaking.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On the morning of May 20, a traffic accident occurred on the Almaty–Yekaterinburg highway, two kilometers from the "Kairak" border post, resulting in the deaths of six foreign nationals.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Six foreign nationals lost their lives in that minibus collision with a truck. Just, uh, gone in an instant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Six foreign nationals lost their lives in that minibus collision with a truck. Just, uh, gone in an instant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On the morning of May 20, a traffic accident occurred on the Almaty–Yekaterinburg highway, two kilometers from the "Kairak" border post, resulting in the deaths of six foreign nationals. According to the Kostanay Region Police Department, a minibus carrying 10 passengers collided with a truck.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And ten passengers total in that vehicle—imagine the chaos. The Kostanay Region Police Department confirmed it all.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And ten passengers total in that vehicle-imagine the chaos. The Kostanay Region Police Department confirmed it all.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Kostanay Region Police Department, a minibus carrying 10 passengers collided with a truck.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and they were rushed to Karabalyk District Hospital, but five are still injured. It's just... a lot to process.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and they were rushed to Karabalyk District Hospital, but five are still injured. It's just... a lot to process.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result of the accident, six people died at the scene, and five others with various injuries were taken to the Karabalyk District Hospital, the department's press service reported.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: A pre-trial investigation is already underway under Part 4 of Article 345. That's for negligence causing multiple deaths.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A pre-trial investigation is already underway under Part four of Article three hundred forty five. That's for negligence causing multiple deaths.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A pre-trial investigation has been launched under Part 4 of Article 345 of the Criminal Code: "Violation of traffic rules or vehicle operation resulting in the death of two or more persons through negligence."

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which suggests, like, maybe there was some serious error involved here, not just bad luck.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which suggests, like, maybe there was some serious error involved here, not just bad luck.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And the crime scene team is still on site doing all the necessary procedures. It's a full-blown criminal case now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And the crime scene team is still on site doing all the necessary procedures. It's a full-blown criminal case now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A crime scene investigation team is currently working at the site, and all necessary investigative procedures are being carried out, the department added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: You know, it makes you wonder about road safety on that highway—especially near border areas where traffic might be intense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, it makes you wonder about road safety on that highway-especially near border areas where traffic might be intense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And with foreign nationals involved, there's going to be diplomatic layers to this too, I bet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And with foreign nationals involved, there's going to be diplomatic layers to this too, I bet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Their families overseas... getting that news. It's just tragic all around.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Their families overseas... getting that news. It's just tragic all around.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you grateful for every safe trip, doesn't it? We take so much for granted.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you grateful for every safe trip, doesn't it? We take so much for granted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, we really do. Let's hope the investigation brings some clarity—and maybe even pushes for better safety measures.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, we really do. Let's hope the investigation brings some clarity-and maybe even pushes for better safety measures.
